row.process: ! --------------------------------------------- :SET &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# = 'Ablaufmgt_Fondsswitch_Bearb' :SET &ABLAUFMGT# = '&ABLAUFMGT#' :SET &VALUTA_SWITCH# = '&VALUTA#' :SET &BEARBEITER# = '68' :SET &BRIEFNUMMER# = '65' :SET &PROGRAM# = '&PROG_LC#' :SET &INIFILE# = '&PROGRAM#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#.ini' :SET &OPTIONS# = '&INIFILE#' :SET &LOGFILE# = '&LOGDIR#/&BEA_BESCHREIBUNG#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#.log' :SET &OUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/&PROGRAM#_RL&ABLAUFMGT#_&TS#.out' :SET &INPUTFILE# = '&WORKDIR#/nb42p800_RL&ABLAUFMGT#_&TS#.out' :INC JOBI.BS20_EXPORT_LOGDIR ! --------------------------------------------- cat << __EOF__ |tee &RUNDIR#/&INIFILE# TERMINE = &TERMINE_IMS# ANZAHL = &ANZAHL# TRACE = &TRACE# PROT_VTR_FILTER = &PROT_VTR_FILTER_BEA# PROT_MSG_TYPE = &PROT_MSG_TYPE_BEA# BESCHREIBUNG = &BEA_BESCHREIBUNG# BEARBEITER = &BEARBEITER# LOGFILE = &LOGFILE# OUTFILE = &OUTFILE# INPUTFILE = &INPUTFILE# [BEARBEITER] COMMIT = &COMMIT# ABLAUFMGT = &ABLAUFMGT# VALUTA_SWITCH = &VALUTA_SWITCH# BRIEFE = &BRIEFE_CTV# BRIEFNUMMER = &BRIEFNUMMER# __EOF__ ! --------------------------------------------- ! Im Deploymenttest den &ABLAUFMGT# anzeigen :IF &UC4_DEPLOYMENT_TEST# = "J" : SET &WS_ARCHIVE_KEY2# = GET_ATT(ARCHIVE_KEY2) : SET &WS_ARCHIVE_KEY2# = "&WS_ARCHIVE_KEY2# - &ABLAUFMGT#" : PUT_ATT ARCHIVE_KEY2 = &WS_ARCHIVE_KEY2# :ENDIF ! --------------------------------------------- !starten Anwendung :INC JOBI.STANDARDJOB ! ---------------------------------------------
